name: reshingle
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to repair a roof by covering it with new shingles (= flat square objects that are attached in rows): Homeowners who reshingle their own roofs must get a permit. This house is going to need to be either reshingled or reroofed in the near future.
More examplesFewer examplesHe had climbed onto the roof of his aunt's house to re-shingle it after a hurricane had damaged it.They spent more than £2,000 having the roof reshingled. The house on Church Street, where the vicar lives, is being reshingled.
